vulnerability.name: USN-4199-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4199-1 fixed several vulnerabilities in libvpx. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that libvpx did not properly handle certain malformed  WebM media files. If an application using libvpx opened a specially crafted  WebM file, a remote attacker could cause a denial of service, or possibly  execute arbitrary code.

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in libvpx. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
